page.title: 05Family Life.
page.content: A Day In The Life Of David Preston(10 years). On a Saturday morning I wake up,go downstairs and have my usual breakfast - toast,cornflakes and a cup of tea. After I have washed my face and cleaned my teeth I watch cartoons and Saturday Superstore on T.V. I then collect from the newsagent my comics 'Buster' and 'Champ' and my Dad's newspaper.At 12noon I have my dinner.If it is fine I have a game of football with my friends.Saturday is also the day I clean my bedroom.I also help my Dad in the garden.My highlights of Saturday are to rent a video film to watch on the television and lie in because I don't go to school.
